render_info.source_dynamic: SELECT al.Id as Id, al.Level as Level, al.Description as Description, FORMAT(al.CreatedDTG, 'dd/MM/yyyy') as CreatedDTG, e.Username as Creator, FORMAT(al.UpdateDTG, 'dd/MM/yyyy') as UpdateDTG, CASE al.isDeleted WHEN 0 THEN N'Còn hiệu lực' ELSE N'Đã xóa' END AS Status FROM [dbo].[AwardingLevel] al join [dbo].[adm_Employee] e on al.CreateUserId = e.EmployeeID
